name: Perfect Pancakes
description: The Perfect Homemade Pancake Recipe is easy to make with ingredients you probably already have on hand. This recipe can easily be turned into a pancake mix or into buttermilk pancakes as well. It's the perfect versatile all-in one recipe.

publisher.name: thestayathomechef.com
publisher.description: Restaurant quality recipes you can easily make at home.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, sift together flour, sugar baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Whisk in milk, eggs, and melted butter just until combined.
Preheat a flat griddle over medium-high heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup of pancake batter onto griddle. Let pancakes cook until bubbles form before flipping.
Cook other side until golden brown. Serve hot with syrup.

Let pancakes cook until bubbles form before flipping. 5Ô∏è‚É£ 00:01:27 - Cook other side until golden brown. Serve hot with syrup. RECIPE NOTES: *You can easily substitute buttermilk in place of the milk in this recipe to turn it into a buttermilk pancake recipe. If you don't have buttermilk on hand, you can also use buttermilk substitutes: https://thestayathomechef.com/buttermilk-substitute/ To turn this recipe into a dry pancake mix: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Transfer to a resealable plastic bag or sealable storage container for storage. When ready to use mix with 1 cup milk, 2 eggs and 1/4 cup melted butter. Double, triple, or quadruple the recipe and you will need 1 3/4 cup of the pancake mix to combine with the wet ingredients. üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥üç¥ Thanks for watching!
